name: Light The Way (itch) (sickk)
description:
--

When we depart from this plane our souls take flight, free from pain.

 And in that moment, a light apears, bright and warm, free from fear. 

So let your light shine each day, and in your passing, light the way.

--

Find your way to the end of this light based platformer!

--

Controls:

Move: WASD 

Jump: [Space]

--

made for Tanner

--
